newsitem.title: USA: Imperial Petroleum to acquire Phonon.
newsitem.headline: Imperial Petroleum to acquire Phonon.

text.p: Imperial Petroleum Recovery Corp said on Thursday that it agreed to buy the assets of Phonon Technologies Inc of Houston, Texas for an undisclosed amount of cash.
Phonon develops microwave-enhanced chemical processes for the petrochemical, petroleum, refining and gas industries, the company said.
Imperial said it has named Richard Wiewiorka, executive vice president at Imperial, as Phonon president and chief executive officer.
